A global amnesia epidemic would spread, leading to a complete loss of memory for all individuals on Earth.
Society would collapse as people would be unable to perform daily tasks, remember important information, or maintain relationships.
People would be unable to recognize themselves or others, leading to widespread confusion and chaos.
The world would be plunged into darkness as people would forget how to use technology and modern conveniences.
The loss of memory would lead to a complete reset of civilization, forcing people to rebuild society from scratch.
